column4: Is it possible to install LAMP with the ubuntu graphical features upon installation? ie LAMP + the features of  ubuntu install
Install a lamp and then install ubuntu-desktopp?
Do the lamp server install then "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop"
I am pretty sure that ubuntu desktop depends on things like X,org
so i would use the server install then run the install of u desktop?
ubuntu-desktop depends on xorg, so you should be set for GUI's
leme check with a friend

but you should be fine
This will give you the server funtionality with a regular desktop
this command? "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop"
